content: I am feeling like the entire world thinks of me as someone else and in reality i am someone different

That sounds incredibly difficult.  It takes a lot of strength to even talk about feeling like that.  I can only imagine how isolating it must feel to believe there's such a disconnect between how you see yourself and how you think others see you.  How long have you been feeling this way?
quite some time, actually. a few months.
That's a long time to feel this way.  It makes perfect sense that you'd feel exhausted by it.  How has this been affecting your day-to-day life?

i don't know, sometimes people refer to me as certain things, or expect me to know certain things. and its not just bad perceptions. even good perceptions. like i have to nod along to pretend to be what i am in the other person's mind. i feel they will lose respect for me if i reveal what i truly am

That sounds incredibly draining, having to constantly maintain this facade.  It makes perfect sense that you’d feel this way after several months of it.  It’s brave of you to share this with me.  How is this impacting your relationships with these people?
can you advice me on how to overcome this?

The feeling of being seen as someone you are not is like navigating a ship by a faulty map.  The land you see before you isn't truly where you are.  The routes charted are based on others' perceptions, not your own true course.  This isn't a failure of navigation, but a misunderstanding of the chart.

You are not adrift; you have a compass within, a sense of your true self, even if it feels hidden under layers of expectations.  Instead of trying to change the map—the expectations of others—begin by charting your own course.  This starts with small, deliberate actions that reveal your authentic self, one small act of self-expression at a time.

What is one small action you can take today to reveal a single facet of your true self?
tell me how do i do it

Alright champ, let's tackle this!  Feeling like people see you as someone you're not is tough, but we're going to change that.  We're not going to change *them*, we're going to build your confidence and let your *true* self shine through!

Forget trying to completely overhaul everything at once. That’s overwhelming. We're going to start small, with one tiny, manageable step.  My plan is to help you reveal just *one* facet of your true self today.  Think of it like a sneak peek, a little taste of the real you.

We're going to use something I call "Strategic Self-Disclosure." It's all about sharing a small, personal detail – something that shows who you really are, without a huge, dramatic reveal.  It’s like carefully peeling back layers of an onion, one delicious layer at a time!

Here's how we do it:

1. **Identify a Safe Space:** Think about one person you trust, even a little. It could be a friend, family member, or even a teacher. Someone who you feel comfortable sharing a small piece of yourself with.

2. **Choose One Tiny Truth:**  What's ONE small thing about yourself that you're comfortable sharing?  It doesn't have to be earth-shattering.  Maybe it's a hobby you love, a quirky interest, a favorite song, or a book you recently enjoyed.  Something small, something authentically *you*.

3. **Practice Your Delivery:** Before you share it, practice saying it out loud to yourself. This will help you feel more confident.

4. **Share Your Truth:**  Today, find a moment to share this tiny truth with the person you chose.  Keep it brief and casual. The goal isn't to make a grand statement, but to simply let a little bit of your true self shine through.

Ready to try this?  What's that one tiny truth we’re revealing today?  Let’s do this!  I know you can do it!  We're going to build momentum, one tiny, confident step at a time.  Let's get started!
kya aap hindi me baat kr skte ho

अरे वाह! हिंदी में बात करने का मौका!  ज़िन्दगी में थोड़ा मज़ा लाने के लिए बिलकुल सही!  तो चलो, आगे बढ़ते हैं!  आपने बताया कि आप काफी समय से ऐसा महसूस कर रहे हैं कि लोग आपको वैसे नहीं समझते जैसे आप खुद को समझते हैं।  ये बिलकुल ठीक है कि ये बात थोड़ी परेशान करने वाली हो सकती है, लेकिन घबराने की ज़रूरत नहीं है! हम इसे एक-एक करके सुलझाएँगे।

ज़रा सोचिए,  ये एक बड़ा सा पहाड़ लग रहा है, है ना?  लेकिन हर पहाड़ छोटे-छोटे पत्थरों से मिलकर बना होता है।  हम इस "पहाड़" को छोटे-छोटे, आसान कदमों में तोड़ेंगे।  और हर कदम पर हम जश्न मनाएँगे!

आज हम एक छोटा सा काम करेंगे -  "आत्म-विश्वास की एक झलक"।  ये क्या है?  ये बस एक छोटी सी बात है, आपके बारे में, जो आप किसी एक भरोसेमंद इंसान के साथ शेयर करेंगे।  कोई बड़ी बात नहीं, बस एक छोटी सी बात जो आपको सच्चा महसूस कराती है।  ये आपका  "रहस्य" नहीं है, ये बस आपकी एक  "झलक" है!

सोचिए,  आपका कोई पसंदीदा गाना, कोई शौक, कोई किताब...  कुछ भी छोटा सा, जो आपको खुशी देता है और आपको आप जैसा महसूस कराता है।  उसे आज किसी एक खास इंसान के साथ शेयर कीजिए।  बस इतना ही!

कैसे है?  कोई छोटी सी बात दिमाग में आई?  चलिए, शुरू करते हैं!  आप कर सकते हैं!  मैं आपके साथ हूँ!  एक छोटा सा कदम, एक बड़ी सी जीत!  आगे बढ़ते हैं!
